channel.title: Projects on Massimo Meert
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Massimo Meert

item.title: akrenovation
item.description: Desktop app for akrenovation, used for house analysis.

item.title: guessera
item.description: A interactive 3D geography game for kids to have fun while learning countries. Built for a hackaton with Cyrus. Read more about it here.

item.title: chishiki
item.description: Chishiki is an extensive database of Kanjis with an easy to use API. The API allows you to look up kanjis by reading, meaning, JLPT level and much more. There’s also a discord bot !

item.title: lfm-go
item.description: A wrapper for the last.fm API, written in Go.

item.title: elle-et-moi
item.description: Inventory management app for the elle-et-moi shop.
